params.prompt: The video features a woman giving a speech, her head slowly turning from right to left, with her gaze following. Her left hand gently taps her chest, seemingly expressing emotions. At the end, she raises her right hand, conveying determination. She is dressed in a purple academic gown, wearing a black hat with golden tassels, standing in front of a microphone. During the speech, the purple background is simple and focused on her dignified posture. Her expressive movements radiate infectious energy, showcasing her confidence and passion, with every moment embodying the sanctity of the ceremony and the sincerity of her emotions.
params.negative_prompt: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走
